New Records: Belgium has not drawn a match at the European Championship since 1980
Key Match Events: Youri Tielemans scored the first goal in the 2nd minute
Kevin De Bruyne scored the second goal in the 80th minute
Koen Casteels made several impressive saves
Romelu Lukaku had two disallowed goals
Post-Match Reflections: Domenico Tedesco expressed relief at the win and mentioned his team's performance
Edward Iordanescu highlighted his team's effort and chances to equalize
Miscellaneous Highlights: All four teams in Group E are on equal points after two matchweeks
This is the first time in European Championship history that all four teams in a group are on equal points
